errors.name: NumericalOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow.

errors.name: UnauthorizedSigner
errors.msg: Unauthorized signer or not enough signatures.

errors.name: WhitelistLengthInvalid
errors.msg: Withdraw whitelist must be between 1 and 5 entries.

errors.name: InvalidInvestmentIdLength
errors.msg: Investment ID is too long or too short, must be 15 bytes.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioLength
errors.msg: stage_ratio length per stage must be exactly 10 elements.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioValue
errors.msg: Stage ratio value must be between 0 and 100.

errors.name: InvalidStageRatioSum
errors.msg: Stage ratio sum for a single stage must not exceed 100.

errors.name: NonContiguousStage
errors.msg: Stage ratio must be contiguous once non-zero values begin.

errors.name: EmptyStageRatio
errors.msg: All stage ratio values are zero.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoNotFound
errors.msg: Investment info not exists.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoNotCompleted
errors.msg: Investment info has not completed yet.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoHasCompleted
errors.msg: Investment info has completed already.

errors.name: InvestmentInfoDeactivated
errors.msg: Investment info has been deactivated and can no longer be modified.

errors.name: InvalidInvestmentInfoPda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected investment info PDA.

errors.name: RecordIdMismatch
errors.msg: Record ID mismatch.

errors.name: AccountIdMismatch
errors.msg: Account ID mismatch.

errors.name: InvalidAccountIdLength
errors.msg: Account ID is too long or too short, must be 15 bytes.

errors.name: InvestmentRecordNotFound
errors.msg: Investment record not found.

errors.name: InvalidRecordPda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected investment record PDA.

errors.name: NoRecordsInRemainingAccounts
errors.msg: There are not investment records in remainingAccounts.

errors.name: RecordAlreadyRevoked
errors.msg: This record has been revoked already.

errors.name: NoRecordsUpdated
errors.msg: No record has been updated.

errors.name: WhitelistMustBeFive
errors.msg: Whitelist must contain exactly 5 members

errors.name: WhitelistAddressExists
errors.msg: Target address already exists in whitelist

errors.name: WhitelistAddressNotFound
errors.msg: Address to be replaced not found in whitelist

errors.name: InvalidVaultPda
errors.msg: Invalid Vault PDA

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Vault token account mint is not USDT or H2coin.

errors.name: InvalidVaultAta
errors.msg: The provided vault ATA does not match the expected associated token address.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientMint
errors.msg: Recipient token account mint is not USDT or H2coin.

errors.name: InvalidVaultOwner
errors.msg: Vault token account owner mismatch.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientOwner
errors.msg: Recipient token account owner mismatch.

errors.name: StandardOnly
errors.msg: Investment type must be `Standard`.

errors.name: TotalShareMismatch
errors.msg: Total share does not match.

errors.name: ProfitCacheNotFound
errors.msg: Profit share cache not found.

errors.name: ProfitCacheExpired
errors.msg: Profit share cache has expired (older than 25 days)

errors.name: ProfitAlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: Profit already executed.

errors.name: InsufficientTokenBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient USDT token balance in vault

errors.name: InsufficientSolBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL balance in vault to cover estimated gas cost

errors.name: InvalidTotalUsdt
errors.msg: Total USDT cannot be 0 or undefined

errors.name: BatchIdMismatch
errors.msg: Batch id does not match expected number.

errors.name: TooManyRecordsLoaded
errors.msg: Too many records have been loaded.

errors.name: MissingAssociatedTokenAccount
errors.msg: Missing associated token account.

errors.name: InvalidProfitCachePda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected profit cache PDA.

errors.name: BpRatioOverflow
errors.msg: Bp ratio overflowed u16.

errors.name: DuplicateRecord
errors.msg: Duplicate record_id detected in input records.

errors.name: RefundCacheExpired
errors.msg: Refund share cache has expired (older than 25 days)

errors.name: RefundCacheNotFound
errors.msg: Refund share cache not found.

errors.name: RefundPeriodInvalid
errors.msg: Refund period is invalid

errors.name: RefundAlreadyExecuted
errors.msg: Refund share already executed.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientATA
errors.msg: Invalid Recipient ATA

errors.name: InvalidTotalH2coin
errors.msg: Total H2coin cannot be 0 or undefined

errors.name: InvalidRefundCachePda
errors.msg: The derived PDA does not match the expected refund cache PDA.

errors.name: EmptyWhitelist
errors.msg: Whitelist must contain at least one wallet.

errors.name: InvalidRecipientAddress
errors.msg: Invalid Recipient wallet Address

errors.name: UnauthorizedRecipient
errors.msg: Recipient wallet is not in the withdraw whitelist.

errors.name: InvalidAssociatedTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid associated token account.

errors.name: InvalidTokenProgramID
errors.msg: Invalid token program ID. Must be Token 2020(Legacy).

errors.name: InvalidAssociatedTokenProgramID
errors.msg: Invalid associated token program ID.

types.name: VaultDepositTokenEvent
docs: Event emitted after a successful token deposit into the vault
